title: Why didn't Ezreal get a login theme?
body: The VU feels so lacking without music for the champion! Why cant all champions get a login theme? It makes some champions feel more important and interesting when they have their own music.

replies.body: Agreed, every champ should have one. I'll be sad if Morde doesn't get a login screen when his vgu finally comes around.
They did, though. Granted it wasnâ€™t his base skin; it was for Pulsefire.
What makes it even more disappointing is his teaser had a really cool theme that fits him and we may never get to hear the full version.
